abstract.t: The background and objectives of the new ETSI project Tiphonarchitecture are described in this draft. The architecture is shownto be capable of use by a number of different signalling systems andsession control protocols, including SIP and H.323. The opportunityexists for the IETF to help with the technology mappings for SIP toensure inter-operation with other technologies through the TIPHONarchitecture.
